metadata.title: CVE-2022-48650 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  scsi: qla2xxx: Fix memory leak in __qlt_24xx_handle_abts()  Commit 8f394da36a36 ("scsi: qla2xxx: Drop TARGET_SCF_LOOKUP_LUN_FROM_TAG") made the __qlt_24xx_handle_abts() function return early if tcm_qla2xxx_find_cmd_by_tag() didn't find a command, but it missed to clean up the allocated memory for the management command.
